legacy.full_text: Congratulations to the Somali people on the concluded election&congrats to the President-elect H.E. Hassan Sheikh Mohamud. Chinese Foreign Ministry Spokesperson also congratulated Mr.Mohamud today. We look forward to even stronger bilateral ties between our two countries.

legacy.full_text:
#WhatToEat for this week in #Beijing? 
We recommend you roasted sweet potato, a seasonal popular bite across China.
The crispy skin and creamy inside fill the autumn with a rich aroma.
Now, grab your coat, pack sweet potatoes, and take a bite of autumn! https://t.co/l3GiFRbUKR https://t.co/V4mVey4Y1g
